description: The incident happened near Henfield in West Sussex, say police.
title: Man, 73, dies after car and bus crash
title_page: Sussex: Man, 73, dies after car and bus crash - BBC News
maintext:
A 73-year-old man has died after his car crashed with a bus in West Sussex.
Sussex Police said they were called to the collision on Brighton Road, Woodmancote, near Henfield, shortly after 11:30 GMT on Tuesday.
The vehicle went on to collide with another car further along the road after crashing with the bus, the force added.
The man - who police said was local to the area- was pronounced dead at the scene, despite efforts by paramedics.
